channel.title: Recommends on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Recommends on My New Hugo Site

item.description: 算法模板 判断质数 int is_prime(int num){ for (int i = 2; i * i < num; i++) { if(num % i == 0) return -1; } return 1; } 判断完全数 int is_perfect_number(int num){ int sum = 0; for (int i = 1; i * i <= num; i++){ if(num % i == 0){ if(i < num) sum += i; if(num / i < num && i != num / i) sum += num / i; } } if(sum == num){ return 1; } return -1; } 数组翻转
